story.storykicker: 9 things to look forward to in Punjab this summer
story.storybody:
Say hola!
June 24-July 3
Discover Spain through a gastronomic journey. The tongue-tickling menu comprises specialties from various regions including Duelosy Quebrantos, Chipirones fritos, Atun Bonito, Empanada de Carne, Pallea marinera and Trucha a la Navarra as well as mouthwatering desserts like Leache frita, Almendrados and Tarta de manzana. Come and savour the authentic experiences and gastronomic highlights of Spain.
MEAL FOR TWO Rs 2,300 plus taxes
AT Kitchen@95, Hyatt Regency, Ludhiana
TEL 0161 4071222

Mango magic {mosimage}
Till June 30
The king of fruits is here to rule your heart. The month-long mango festival has a delectable array of mango based cakes and pastries such as Fresh Mango Cake, Mango Tart, Mango Cheesecake and lots more.It's time to Go Mangoes!
AT Pinjore Gardens. Kalka Shimla Rd, Pinjaur, Panchkula, Haryana
TEL 01733 231 877

Wine 'n dine
Till June 30
Love long wine evenings? Well, this one is perfect for you. Canape and Wine festival promises to take you on a delectable food journey, offering a myriad of flavours in a bite size form.
ATThe Lounge Bar, Hyatt Amritsar
TEL 0183 287 1234

Fashion Forward
February 28
The sixth store of H&M, the international retailer, known for fashion and quality, opened at the North Country Mall in Mohali last month. It happens to be the first H&M store in Punjab's tri-city area, and is spread over 27,000 sq ft, with dedicated sections for ladies, men, children and teenagers. The store's crisp and bright interiors are the perfect backdrop to this selection, offering the hottest trends as well as timeless classics for the fashionconscious customer.
AT North Country Mall
PRICE Rs 699 onwards for clothes

Duras' diary{mosimage}
June 7
A story of war and resistance by Maud Andrieux. The story will be told using the life and books of Marguerite Duras, one of France�??s most distinguished writers. ATCaféTheatre, Alliance Française de Chandigarh TIMINGS 7:00p.m.

Dance of llife
June 12
Alliance Francaise of Chandigarh will present a dance performance La Foret Ebouriffee based on the book La foret de Racine by Melusine Thiry.
TICKETS Entry free
AT Tagore Theatre, Chandigarh
TIMINGS 6:30 p.m

Father's day out
June 19
It's time to show dad how much he means to you. Come with your family and treat the man to a special Father's Day Buffet. The spread will include delicacies like Shawarma rolls, teppanyaki counter, roasted chicken and Mango cake. The live Pasta counter is bound to leave him asking for more. Dad gets a free meal
AT Kitchen@95 Hyatt Regency, Ludhiana
TEL 0161 4071222

Duras' diary
June 8 to 17
If you have been looking for an opportunity to learn to bake the perfect cake from a scratch, this workshop is just for you. From basic butter cake to delicate Genoise, you will bake different base cakes, decorate them and create classic chocolate desserts.
AT Black and Tan Chocolatiers, 1154, Sector 36C, Chandigarh
Tel 9041777026

Educatus expo
June 11 to 12
Yet to figure out what to do in life? Well, a visit to the Educatus Expo could be worth it. The event aims to provide students details of prospects in management, engineering and the medical stream.
AT Hotel Shivalik, Chandigarh
TEL 01722700001
